_comment: Created by ianb on 16/12/2014 11:17:27 using v2.3
title: How has the proportion of obese 4-5 year old children changed over time?
analysis_commentary: The proportion of reception aged children who are overweight or obese is approximately 22% in 2012/13. Overall, the percent of reception aged children who are overweight, obese or underweight has remained broadly stable between 2006/07 and 2012/13.
